:orphan:

=======
docxgen
=======

A library to generate Microsoft Office Word 2007 documents.

`Github <https://github.com/kunxi/docxgen>`_ | 
`Issues <https://github.com/kunxi/docxgen/issues>`_ | 
`PyPi <https://pypi.python.org/kunxi/docxgen>`_

This work is proudly sponsored by `SurveyMonkey`_.

.. _SurveyMonkey: https://www.surveymonkey.com
